languages.text: "Вверены мне заботы о часовне-реликварии и о фамильном склепе династии. Также я провожу богослужения, освящаю отсеки и укрепляю сердца экипажа в темные часы, чтобы никто не дрогнул перед ужасами, что таятся в тьме, и исполнил свой долг".

"I am entrusted with caring for the reliquary chapel and the dynastic crypt. I also conduct liturgies, consecrate the ship's bays, and strengthen the crew's hearts whenever a dark hour is upon us, lest any among them falter in the face of the horrors lurking in the darkness, and fail in their duty."
languages.original_text: "Вверены мне заботы о часовне-реликварии и о фамильном склепе династии. Также я провожу богослужения, освящаю отсеки и укрепляю сердца экипажа в темные часы, чтобы никто не дрогнул перед ужасами, что таятся в тьме, и исполнил свой долг".

traits.locale_text: "I am entrusted with care of the reliquary chapel and the dynastic crypt. I also conduct liturgies, consecrate the ship's bays, and strengthen the crew's hearts whenever a dark hour is upon us, lest any among them falter in the face of the horrors lurking in the darkness, and fail in their duty."

"I am the ship's confessor, Your {mf|Lord|Ladyship}. I am entrusted with taking care of the reliquary chapel and the spiritual purity of this ship's congregation. I also conduct liturgies, consecrate the ship's bays, and strenghten the crew's hearts whenever a dark hour is upon us, lest any among them falter in the face of the horrors lurking in the darkness, and fail in their duty."

"I am entrusted with caring for the reliquary chapel and the dynastic crypt. I also conduct liturgies, consecrate the ship's bays, and strengthen the crew's hearts whenever a dark hour is upon us, lest any among them falter in the face of the horrors lurking in the darkness, and fail in their duty."

I also conduct liturgies, consecrate the ship's bays, and strengthen the crew's hearts whenever a dark hour is upon us, lest any among them falter in the face of the horrors lurking in the darkness, and fail in their duty."

"I am entrusted with caring for the reliquary chapel and the dynastic crypt. I also conduct liturgies, consecrate the ship's bays, and strengthen the crew's hearts whenever a dark hour is upon us, lest any among them falter in the face of the horrors lurking in the darkness, and fail in their duty."

"I am entrusted with care of the reliquary chapel and the dynastic crypt. I also conduct liturgies, consecrate the ship's bays, and strengthen the crew's hearts whenever a dark hour is upon us, lest any among them falter in the face of the horrors lurking in the darkness, and fail in their duty."

"I am entrusted with caring for the reliquary chapel and the dynastic crypt. I also conduct liturgies, consecrate the ship's bays, and strengthen the crew's hearts whenever a dark hour is upon us, lest any among them falter in the face of the horrors lurking in the darkness, and fail in their duty."

"I am entrusted with caring for the reliquary chapel and the dynastic crypt. I also conduct liturgies, consecrate the ship's bays, and strengthen the crew's hearts whenever a dark hour is upon us, lest any among them falter in the face of the horrors lurking in the darkness, and fail in their duty."

languages.text: « Mon rôle consiste à veiller sur la chapelle reliquaire, ainsi que sur la crypte dynastique. Je mène également des cérémonies liturgiques, je consacre les baies du vaisseau et j'encourage l'équipage dans les heures sombres, pour l'empêcher de faiblir face aux horreurs qui rôdent dans les ténèbres et de faillir à leur devoir. »
languages.original_text: "I am entrusted with caring for the reliquary chapel and the dynastic crypt. I also conduct liturgies, consecrate the ship's bays, and strengthen the crew's hearts whenever a dark hour is upon us, lest any among them falter in the face of the horrors lurking in the darkness, and fail in their duty."

traits.locale_text: « Mon rôle consiste à veiller sur la chapelle reliquaire, ainsi que sur la crypte dynastique. Je mène également des cérémonies liturgiques, je consacre les baies du vaisseau et j'encourage l'équipage dans les heures sombres, pour l'empêcher de faiblir face aux horreurs qui rôdent dans les ténèbres et de faillir à leur devoir. »

languages.text: «Me ha sido confiado el cuidado del relicario y la cripta de la dinastía. También oficio liturgias, consagro los muelles de la nave y fortalezco el ánimo de la tripulación cada vez que la oscuridad se cierne sobre nosotros, para que nadie titubee ante los horrores que acechan en las tinieblas y desatienda sus deberes».
languages.original_text: "I am entrusted with caring for the reliquary chapel and the dynastic crypt. I also conduct liturgies, consecrate the ship's bays, and strengthen the crew's hearts whenever a dark hour is upon us, lest any among them falter in the face of the horrors lurking in the darkness, and fail in their duty."

traits.locale_text: «Me ha sido confiado el cuidado del relicario y la cripta de la dinastía. También oficio liturgias, consagro los muelles de la nave y fortalezco el ánimo de la tripulación cada vez que la oscuridad se cierne sobre nosotros, para que nadie titubee ante los horrores que acechan en las tinieblas y desatienda sus deberes».

languages.text: “我负责照看圣物礼拜堂与王朝的地下墓穴，维护这艘舰船的信仰。每当黑暗的时刻来临时，我都会负责主持仪式，鼓舞船员们的精神，以免他们之中有人在恐怖面前惊慌失措，以致无法履行职责。”
languages.original_text: "I am entrusted with caring for the reliquary chapel and the dynastic crypt. I also conduct liturgies, consecrate the ship's bays, and strengthen the crew's hearts whenever a dark hour is upon us, lest any among them falter in the face of the horrors lurking in the darkness, and fail in their duty."

traits.locale_text: “我负责照看圣物礼拜堂与王朝的地下墓穴，维护这艘舰船的信仰。每当黑暗的时刻来临时，我都会负责主持仪式，鼓舞船员们的精神，以免他们之中有人在恐怖面前惊慌失措，以致无法履行职责。”

languages.text: 「私は船の信徒で、聖遺物礼拝堂の管理と、この船の信徒たちの霊的な純潔を守ることを任されています。他にも典礼を執り行い、船室を聖別し、暗黒の時が訪れるたびに乗組員の心を強くしています。暗闇に潜む恐怖にくじけ、義務を果たせない者が出ないようにするためです」
languages.original_text: "I am entrusted with caring for the reliquary chapel and the dynastic crypt. I also conduct liturgies, consecrate the ship's bays, and strengthen the crew's hearts whenever a dark hour is upon us, lest any among them falter in the face of the horrors lurking in the darkness, and fail in their duty."

traits.locale_text: 「私は船の信徒です。私は聖遺物礼拝堂の管理と、この船の信徒たちの霊的な純潔を守ることを任されています。私は他にも典礼を執り行い、船室を聖別し、暗黒の時が訪れるたびに乗組員の心を強くしています。暗闇に潜む恐怖にくじけ、義務を果たせない者が出ないようにするためです」

languages.text: "Mir wurde die Verantwortung für die Reliquiarkapelle und die dynastische Krypta übertragen. Überdies halte ich Liturgien ab, weihe die Module des Schiffs und stärke die Herzen der Crew in düsteren Stunden, auf dass niemand im Angesicht des in der Finsternis lauernden Grauens ins Wanken gerät und seine Pflichten vernachlässigt."
languages.original_text: "I am entrusted with caring for the reliquary chapel and the dynastic crypt. I also conduct liturgies, consecrate the ship's bays, and strengthen the crew's hearts whenever a dark hour is upon us, lest any among them falter in the face of the horrors lurking in the darkness, and fail in their duty."

traits.locale_text: "Mir wurde die Verantwortung für die Reliquiarkapelle und die dynastische Krypta übertragen. Überdies halte ich Liturgien ab, weihe die Module des Schiffs und stärke die Herzen der Crew in düsteren Stunden, auf dass niemand im Angesicht des in der Finsternis lauernden Grauens ins Wanken gerät und seine Pflichten vernachlässigt."

languages.text: "Kutsal emanet odası şapeliyle ve hanedanlık mahzeniyle ilgilenmek benim vazifem. Ayrıca ayinler düzenler, geminin bölmelerini kutsar ve karanlık zamanlarda mürettebatın yüreğini güçlendiririm ki karanlıkta kol gezen dehşetlerle yüzleşenler dirayetlerini kaybetmesin ve vazifelerini aksatmasın."
languages.original_text: "I am entrusted with caring for the reliquary chapel and the dynastic crypt. I also conduct liturgies, consecrate the ship's bays, and strengthen the crew's hearts whenever a dark hour is upon us, lest any among them falter in the face of the horrors lurking in the darkness, and fail in their duty."
